PreToolUse.matcher: tool == "Bash" && command matches "dotnet run|npm run dev|npm start"

hooks.command: echo '[Hook] Reminder: Consider running in a separate terminal or using tmux for long-running processes'
echo '[Hook] WARNING: Force push detected. Ensure this is intentional and not to main/master branch.'

PostToolUse.matcher: tool == "Bash" && command matches "dotnet build|npm run build" && exit_code != 0

hooks.command: echo '[Hook] Build failed. Check error messages above and fix issues before continuing.'

PostToolUse.matcher: tool == "Bash" && command matches "dotnet test|npm test" && exit_code != 0

hooks.command: echo '[Hook] Tests failed. Fix failing tests before continuing with TDD workflow.'
echo '[Hook] C# file written. Remember to run dotnet build to verify compilation.'
hooks.description: Remind to build after C# changes

hooks.command: echo '[Hook] TypeScript/React file written. Consider running npm run typecheck.'
hooks.description: Remind to typecheck after TS changes

hooks.command: echo '[Hook] WARNING: console.log/Console.Write detected. Remove before committing.'
echo '[Session Start] .NET 8 + React/Next.js project. Use /dotnet-plan, /dotnet-tdd, /react-tdd for workflows.'
echo '[Session End] Remember: Run tests before committing (dotnet test && npm test)'
